name: Smartwool PhD Outdoor Ultra Light Mini Socks - Unisex
categories: PhD Outdoor Ultra Light Mini Socks
description: Mini socks for mega adventures. These minimalist socks use a merino wool blend and seamless construction to keep your feet happy while you're out on the trails. Super-thin cushioning is great for close-fitting footwear.Made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.
